field.name: name
field.label: Site Name
field.description: Enter a descriptive name for this site. This name will be displayed in the SIMON dashboard and used to identify the site in reports. Example: 'Main Company Website' or 'Client Portal'

field.name: url
field.label: Site URL
field.description: Enter the full URL of this site, including the protocol (http:// or https://). This URL will be used to identify the site and may be used for notifications. Example: https://www.example.com

field.name: external_id
field.label: External ID
field.description: Optional external identifier for this site. This can be used to link the site to an external system or tracking identifier. Leave blank if not needed.

field.name: auth_token
field.label: Authentication Token
field.description: Optional authentication token for this site. This token can be used for additional security when submitting data. Leave blank if not needed.

field.name: notes
field.label: Notes
field.description: Optional notes or additional information about this site. This information is stored in the SIMON system for reference.

field.name: status
field.label: Status
field.description: Set the status of this site. Only enabled sites will have their data collected and submitted to the SIMON API. Disable a site to temporarily stop data collection without deleting the configuration.
